projects.title: Natours
projects.description: Modern website with lots of cool animations and images by using modern cutting-edge CSS techniques : Animations with @keyframes and transition, pseudo-classes and custom CSS properties including clip-path, background-clip, mask-image, background-blend-mode, shape-outside, filter, backdrop-filter, object-fit, transform, column-count, hyphens, perspective, calc() and so on. Since this project is focused on CSS, there's no actual functions implemented.

projects.title: Trillo
projects.description: Modern website with lots of cool animations by using Flexbox layouts. Again, there's no actual function because this project is achieved by only CSS. Flexbox helps my life a lot easier since it took me only a couple of hours to build this website.

projects.title: FormValidator
projects.description: Simple Modern Form with basic validation of length, email and passwords match. Simple CSS and JavaScript allow us to implement dynamic style change depending on input value. It took 1 hour to complete this mini project from scratch.
